name: Ruin Grader
description:
An ancient humanoid war machine.
Their form is similar to that of Ruin Guards, but is more distorted and more powerful. Energy cores have been installed in both its legs, as though to power its overly heavy form.

investigation.name: Ruin Guard
investigation.description: An ancient humanoid war machine.\nThey are said to be remnants from a lost ancient nation. Some believe that they were developed not as war machines, but as protectors of the ruins.\nThough that hypothesis does not explain why would they choose to employ explosive weaponry inside the very ruins they are supposed to protect...
